channel.title: [PI] If Object Is spawned Send message
channel.description:
Hey guys, Im working on a little system which spawns an object and sends a message, what im asking for is if someone knows how to make it so that when the object is spawned it sends a message every 6 minutes?
Any Help is appreciate thanks :)

item.title: [PI] If Object Is spawned Send message
item.dc:creator: @Dragonxile Dragonxile
item.description:
@Dragonxile wrote:

Well I dont think it has to be event manager, it could be any kinda way i guess, just aslong as the server picks up that the object is spawned to send a message every 6 minutes untill the object has been clicked and deleted

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] If Object Is spawned Send message

item.description:
@zoomer wrote:

Only other thing I can really think of is to-

getDelay();

Sorry if this is not much help not really sure on how eventmanagers work.

item.title: [PI] If Object Is spawned Send message
item.dc:creator: @Dragonxile Dragonxile
item.description:
@Dragonxile wrote:

Im Making a hide and seek system heres what i tryed but it failed

[code] public void objecthint() {
EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
public void execute(EventContainer c) {

getPA().checkObjectSpawn(75, 3620, 3543, 0, 10);
sendMessage("[Hint] Im on a broken boat");

getPA().checkObjectSpawn(75, 3116, 3178, 0, 10);
sendMessage("[Hint] Im on a bridge next to a tower");

getPA().checkObjectSpawn(75, 3182, 3187, 0, 10);
sendMessage("[Hint] This swamp is very ewwww");

getPA().checkObjectSpawn(75, 2626, 3599, 0, 10);
sendMessage("[Hint] This is a strange altar in front of me");

getPA().checkObjectSpawn(75, 3422, 3484, 0, 10);
sendMessage("[Hint] im near a saradomin statue");

getPA().checkObjectSpawn(75, 3570, 3312, 0, 10);
sendMessage("[Hint] I live near my brothers");

getPA().checkObjectSpawn(75, 3299, 3121, 0, 10);
sendMessage("[Hint] Im dehydrated");

getPA().checkObjectSpawn(75, 2141, 4855, 0, 10);
sendMessage("[Hint] Im on a magical floating platform");

getPA().checkObjectSpawn(75, 2571, 3119, 0, 10);
sendMessage("[Hint] You will have to cut through these webs to enter");

getPA().checkObjectSpawn(75, 3021, 9736, 0, 10);
sendMessage("[Hint] A miners favourite place to work");
			
		
		}
	}, 60000); // Time it takes to spawn an object
};[/code]

Basically u can see what im trying to do right??

I want it to send a message every 6 minutes if the particular object is spawned I hope im making seance lol

Read full topic
